description: TCS3200 Color Sensor is a complete color detector, including a TAOS TCS3200 RGB sensor chip and 4 white LEDs. It can detect a wide range of visible colors and is used for test strip reading, sorting by color, ambient light sensing, calibration, and color matching.

other: High-resolution conversion of light intensity to frequency
Programmable color and full-scale output frequency
Supports LED lamp light supplement control

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect Vcc to 5V, GND to GND, S0 to D3, S1 to D4, S2 to D5, S3 to D6, OUT to D2.

example_code.explaination: This sketch initializes the TCS3200 sensor, sets up timer interrupts to count frequency pulses for each color channel, calculates RGB values, and displays them on an LCD. The S0–S3 pins are used to select the color filter and frequency scaling, while the OUT pin provides the frequency output.

source_document: User Manual for TCS 3200 Color Sensor (ME069)
